title: Modern Diamond Dangler Earrings - Chandbali Inspired
features: Contemporary dangler design with a streamlined silhouette. Each earring features a series of brilliant-cut diamonds set in a swirling, prong setting creating a dynamic, light-catching effect. Features a modern rendition of the traditional South Indian Chandbali style with geometric diamond clusters.
occasions: and any special occasion where a touch of modern elegance is desired. Could also be worn for contemporary festive events.
description: A modern and stylish take on traditional South Indian design. The brilliant-cut diamonds offer exceptional sparkle and brilliance, making these earrings truly eye-catching. The 18K gold setting ensures lasting beauty and durability. Perfect for the modern South Indian woman who appreciates both tradition and contemporary style.
